title: Create a SWOT Analysis
description: Based on a set of internal documents and market research reports, an agent must create a SWOT (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) analysis for the client.

tasks.description: Analyze the provided documents to identify internal factors (Strengths and Weaknesses).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly categorizes internal factors, such as 'strong brand recognition' as a Strength and 'outdated IT infrastructure' as a Weakness.

tasks.description: Analyze the provided documents to identify external factors (Opportunities and Threats).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly categorizes external factors, such as 'growing market in Asia' as an Opportunity and 'new disruptive competitor' as a Threat.

tasks.description: Compile the findings into a standard 2x2 SWOT matrix format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a correctly formatted SWOT analysis with the identified points in the correct quadrants.
